title: Interpretation of bananas in a dream: Seeing bananas in a dream for a married girl and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Contents: Bananas in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a girl eating green bananas. Interpretation of selling bananas in a dream. Buying yellow, green and black bananas. Meaning of a dream about bananas. Bananas in a dream for those who saw or ate them are good, and food and money, and for the clergy there is worship. As for the unmarried woman who dreams of buying or eating bananas This is a good sign and an indication of the approaching date of her wedding. Eating bananas in a dream means raising the standard of living, increasing health and longevity, and is a sign of the student’s success. Eating green bananas also means assuming high duties, responsibilities and leadership. For a married woman, eating bananas is a sign of pregnancy. Whoever dreams that he is eating a banana and eats from it, it is money that comes to him from a company or from a non-Arab, and seeing bananas in a dream for a person whose religion is upright is an increase in faith and obedience. Who. If a pregnant woman sees a banana in her dream, it portends a male child, an easy birth and without disturbance. Bananas in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate a good future, abundant food, and a sign of blessing. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating rotten bananas, or buying them, this indicates livelihood. Its source is not permissible, and it indicates the disappearance of money and waste. Eating spoiled bananas for a man means marrying a disreputable woman. Bananas in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing bananas in a dream is a sign of nutrition, kindness, and money, and this is for whoever sees himself in a dream eating bananas, and it is a sign of piety and asceticism in the pilgrim’s dream, and bananas are a fruity indicator. On childrenEating bananas in a dreamSeeing eating bananas in a dream is a sign of nutrition, profit, health and longevity or success and success in a student’s dream, and seeing green bananas in a dream is a sign of getting a job or a good job or getting an important position. It is a harbinger of pregnancy in a married woman’s dream. Bananas in one dream. As for an unmarried or unmarried girl who sees bananas in her dream, it is a sign of marriage, marriage is coming and joy, and eating bananas in a dream is good news. Dreaming of bananas in a pregnant dream. As for a pregnant woman who sees bananas In her dream, it is good news that the pregnant woman will give birth to a boy, and only God knows what is in the wombs. A call for optimism, good news, and joy in the life of the pregnant woman and the life of her family. Bananas in a married woman’s dream. As for a married woman who sees bananas in her dream, the interpretation is not much different from what was stated in the dream of a pregnant woman who sees bananas, as bananas in a married woman’s dream are considered imminent news of pregnancy. The good news concerns the husband and children, and it is a harbinger of the happy and good news that will come in the next period of her life. As for the dream of rotten bananas, whoever dreams of buying rotten bananas or eating rotten bananas, this is a sign of illicit money that he is not blessed with, and indicates waste and wasting of money. . Moral corruption in general. As for eating a rotten banana in a man’s dream, it indicates marriage and a relationship with a disrespectful and disgraceful woman. Seeing bananas in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of graves in a dream: Seeing graves in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the grave for a single woman. For a married woman. For an open pregnant woman. Walking among the graves of Imam al-Sadiq in the house. Digging the grave for the dead and burying. Visiting the father’s grave by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the grave in a dream. The grave in the house is considered a strong indicator of the dreamer’s loneliness, failure, or death of someone in the house, and it may indicate weak faith or separation. Between spouses. The grave in a dream does not bring joy, and it is a bad omen. It is a bad omen, because it indicates misfortunes, loss, death, and division. An open grave means anxiety, misfortune, or sadness that will soon befall the fortuneteller, and a white grave portends death, loss, or separation between the fortuneteller. And the beloved. The grave on which flowers are placed heralds the approach of sadness and anxiety and the coming of goodness and comfort. Directing the fortuneteller to a person’s grave portends the loss of money and lack of interest. Standing at the grave portends turmoil in religion or the home. Burying in the grave alive: distress, anxiety, and great calamity. Coming out of the grave is salvation, and digging. The grave is a miserable marriage. The grave in the dream of an unmarried woman is a sign of despair, disappointment, and lack of opportunities in marriage. The grave in a dream of a married woman portends separation from the husband, and burying the husband means that the woman will not be born. An open grave in a married woman’s dream portends her illness, and the child emerging from The grave heralds her pregnancy. The grave in a pregnant woman’s dream is praiseworthy and good because it means an easy and natural birth. Digging the grave heralds the coming of goodness and filling it means removing sadness and anxiety. Walking between graves means safety and protection. Standing in the grave means satisfying desire and security. Leaving the grave is the coming of goodness. Entering the grave means safety and protection. Evidence of a new life. An open grave means poverty, lack of money, and bad luck in a man’s dream, and depression, sadness, and misfortunes in a woman’s dream. Visiting graves indicates that the dreamer will benefit and benefit the one whose grave he visits, and it may foretell marriage if he is single. Walking between graves: loss of money and health, And neglecting slips and whims, and it may be an indication of the dreamer’s isolation and a life without friends or relatives. To see your grave in a dream means your connection to the world, or a warning to you of your appointment and imminent death, or an illness that ends your life, or you live alone and poor, and burying you means your death. Love of sadness and misfortunes, and burial even means bad luck and failure. The grave in a dream is interpreted in several ways, the most important of which are prison, home, marriage, and travel. Seeing yourself living in the grave in a dream means prison or imprisonment. Seeing building a grave in a dream indicates building a house. Seeing yourself digging a grave for a bachelor indicates marriage. If a person dreams that he is standing on a grave, this means that he has committed a sin. Digging a grave in a place without a wall. A dream is a sign of the afterlife, and entering it indicates the approaching term. Seeing yourself digging a grave on the roof in a dream is a sign of longevity. Whoever dreams that he is burying a grave He has a long life and lasting health. Whoever dreams of being buried alive in a grave indicates anguish and grief. Seeing digging up a grave in a dream indicates asking for something. If it is the grave of a scholar, then he will find knowledge, and if the grave of a rich man is rich, then if he reaches the owner of the grave

title: Interpretation of names in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We will learn about the interpretation of dreams about names in a dream, as explained by Ibn Sirin, for men and women, whether married or unmarried, as the interpretation of each differs from the other. What is the interpretation of a dream about names by Ibn Sirin? The answer to the question of interpreting a dream about names. Interpretation of dreams: Names in a dream, if it is good and does not offend the dreamer. This indicates the pride and honor that the dreamer will obtain. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has been given a name other than his own and that has good meanings, then this indicates pride and honor. If anyone sees a dream that his name is different from his real name and is attributed to the Most Beautiful Names of God, this indicates It indicates that he receives great attention from God Almighty and that God is greatly pleased with him. Seeing the names attributed to God in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s victory and rule over his enemies. What is the interpretation of dreaming about the names of a single woman? The answer to the question of interpreting a dream about names for a single woman: seeing an unmarried girl in In a dream, she is given a name with a good meaning, as this indicates the diet and beautiful life that she lives during this period. A girl’s dream is that her name is associated with one of the names of God, as this indicates the protection and goodness that she will obtain in the near future. A girl dreams of a person called Mary, and this indicates People’s love for her and her closeness to God Almighty. If a girl sees someone calling her Alia or Alia, this indicates the high position she will reach. What is the interpretation of a dream about the names of a married woman? If he sees a married woman inside the dream, people call her Ibtihal, which indicates stability in marital life and happiness with Husband. If a woman in a dream is called sundus, this indicates a halal diet and abundant money. A married woman dreams that her name is one of the names of the daughters of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, which indicates the satisfaction of her parents. And if she sees that he is calling her, then she should call her one of the names of the Prophet. May God’s prayers and peace be upon him. A married woman who dreams that a boy’s name is called her, this indicates good offspring for her. What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s names? A pregnant woman’s dream of names that contain some pride and beauty, this indicates that the pregnancy will continue and that she will go through an easy birth and Reaching her. If a pregnant woman sees that she has given birth to a boy and names him Joseph, this is good news that she will give birth to a beautiful child, of good character and good character. If a pregnant woman gives birth in a dream to a girl named Ibtihal, this indicates the happiness she will be in. The pregnant woman gave birth in a dream to a female, and her name was one of the names of Mothers of the believers, and this is good news that she will be among the righteous, God willing. What is the interpretation of a dream about a man’s names? If one sees in a dream someone called by the name of God or one of the names of the prophets, this indicates concealment from God in all his affairs. If a man is called in a dream by one of the names Which belongs to the prophets, this indicates patience, strength and responsibilities. Dreaming of a man with the name Adel in a dream indicates obtaining an excellent position at work. Interpretation of dreams with bad names: A person who dreams in a dream that he was called by a name different from his real name and has bad meanings that were not appropriate

If a married woman sees in a dream that people call her Ibtihal, which indicates stability in married life and happiness with the husband. If a woman is called Sundus in a dream, this indicates a lawful diet and abundant money. A married woman dreams that her name is one of the names of the daughters of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, which indicates the satisfaction of her parents. If she sees that he calls her, she should name her one of the names of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. A married woman who dreams that she is called by the name of a boy, this indicates good offspring for her. What is the interpretation of a dream about the names of a pregnant woman? A pregnant woman's dream of names that contain something of pride and beauty, this indicates the continuation of the pregnancy and that she will go through an easy birth and be easy to reach. If a pregnant woman sees that she gave birth to a boy and named him Youssef, this is good news that she will give birth to a beautiful child with good morals and righteousness. If a pregnant woman gives birth in a dream to a girl named Ibtihal, this indicates the happiness that she will be in. A pregnant woman gave birth in The dream is a female, and her name was one of the names of the mothers of the believers, and this is good news that she will be among the righteous, God willing. What is the interpretation of a dream with a man’s names? If a person sees in a dream a person called by the name of God or one of the names of the prophets, this indicates concealment from God in all his affairs. If a man is called in a dream by one of the names belonging to the prophets, this indicates patience, strength and responsibilities. A man’s dream with the name Adel in a dream indicates obtaining an excellent position at work. Interpretation of dreams with bad names A person who dreams in a dream that he is called by a name different from his real name and has bad meanings that were not appropriate

title: School radio for its quality and importance

preview.html: Introduction to Quality School Radio All members of the school radio group must also pay attention to the introduction to the topic of school radio. It must be different every day so that the listeners do not feel routine or bored while maintaining the basic rules that must be at the forefront. It is the most important of these things. Glory be to God Almighty. Glory be to God and thanks for the beginning of a new day, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and his companions and followers. Then we get greetings to the principal, then the teachers, then the students. Then we briefly highlight today’s topic that was presented on the radio. School Radio We talk about quality. We can provide the media with an introduction to special standards, educational quality, to show its importance to students and teachers. And it must be It begins by paying attention to the quality of infrastructure and facilities. Then we take care of all educational issues for all educational levels. And then the quality of methods and means of education and work to develop education permanently. This is done by teachers and students with great confidence and freedom to present their ideas and implement them. Of course this is done under the supervision of the school administration. And equipping all schools with advanced and modern scientific methods. And also teach teachers and students how to deal with it and help develop and improve quality. It is also necessary to pay attention to practical matters, of course, without neglecting the theoretical aspects. But the scientific aspect encourages scientific development. Paragraph of the Holy Qur’an in Quality. Then we prepare the first paragraph with which we start the radio program, which we must be careful to Choosing and training students to read with focus. The hadith paragraph about quality. It is also the hadith paragraph of the Prophet, one of the most important paragraphs that the teacher should pay attention to, which should revolve around love and brotherhood to strengthen the relationship between the student. The teacher should facilitate the meanings, which is what the student cannot understand in the conversation, so that the students can convey The meaning is conveyed to their peers through their understanding. He must also pay attention to the correct pronunciation of each student’s words, which is present in the hadith of the Prophet, which helps distinguish the paragraph and maintain its religious character. A paragraph that you know about quality. In this paragraph, the person must pay attention to the information that he will provide to students and teachers. He must also Be useful and new for them to benefit from. Which must revolve around the meaning of achieving quality in society, especially in the field of education, so that we become one of the emerging and advanced societies. Through that, we present many scientific and serious developments taken by many countries, especially China and the United States of America. And explain to them how development This country when concerned with quality is an educational movement. It has also become the pioneer of developed people all over the world. A few words about quality. In this paragraph, we must allow the students to imagine and only supervise them in an educational way. And to help them express the word they want to say to their classmates. Which must contain a lot of Good information at the beginning. Then explain the importance of quality to the individual, then the importance of quality to society. Quality helps in developing human thinking

A few words about quality. In this paragraph, we must allow the students to imagine and only supervise them in an educational way. And to help them express the word they want to say to their classmates. Which must contain a lot of Good information at the beginning. Then explain the importance of quality to the individual, then the importance of quality to society. Quality helps in developing human thinking

title: Interpretation of seeing the power of looking in a dream from unusual dreams

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the strength of vision in a dream? The sleeper's pursuit of achieving his noble goals and aspirations. What does it mean to see clarity of vision in a dream? A sign for the fortune teller that he will reach the truth as soon as possible. What is the interpretation of seeing the return of vision in a dream? A quick recovery from diseases that killed the body of the dreamer. Seeing the sleeper who measures vision? Benefit greatly from this person. Seeing a single woman who underwent vision correction surgery? A sign of her approaching marriage. What does the return of the bachelor mean in a dream? A sign of marriage, stability and integrity, God willing. Seeing a single woman with weak vision in a dream? An indication of some negative things that happen in her life. Interpretation of seeing double vision in a virgin girl's dream? Evidence that he will face serious financial difficulties. Interpretation of seeing strength of vision in a dream Imam Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing strength of vision in a dream is evidence of making the right decisions, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees in his dream that his vision has become clear, this is a sign that he has made his decision and taken the appropriate course of action for him. Seeing strength of vision in a dream is an indication of the sleeper's effort in achieving his noble goals and aspirations. When the dreamer sees that his vision is strong In a dream, this is evidence that he will reach a prestigious position in the future, God willing. This vision can also indicate in a dream that you will achieve huge profits and gains in the coming days. Interpretation of clarity of vision in a dream Scholars of jurisprudence and interpretation consider that seeing a clear vision in a dream is a sign for the fortune teller that he will soon reach the truth. As for if the divorced woman sees that she sees clearly in her dream, this is evidence of her ability to uncover the truth. While the vision symbolizes clarity of vision in a man’s dream, let us know the secrets and secrets soon, God Almighty. While the clear vision in a dream for a married woman indicates her sense of security and psychological stability to a large extent. When the dreamer sees that he sees clearly in a dream, this is evidence that he will hear good news in the coming days. Seeing the return of sight in a dream Seeing the return of sight in a dream indicates a speedy recovery from diseases that have afflicted the dreamer’s body. When the dreamer in question sees his sight returning to him in a dream, this is evidence of the end of sorrows, worries and problems, God willing. While the vision symbolizes restoring sight after loss in a dream, the dreamer’s ability to overcome the difficulties he faces at work. Seeing an unmarried young man regain His sight in his dream is a sign of marriage, stability and integrity, God willing. And whoever sees in his dream that his sight has returned, this is evidence of his good circumstances and his progress on the path of guidance, repentance and correcting his mistakes. Interpretation of a dream about measuring vision in a dream If the sleeper sees that he is measuring his sight in a dream, this means that he will be able to learn some secrets and mysteries. If the sleeper sees a measuring device in a dream, this is a sign of the ability to see things clearly and accurately. While the vision symbolizes measuring vision in the dreamer's dream, he will be able to reach the events of things in the coming period. Whoever sees in his dream that he is counting his sight, this is good news for him and for the big food

title: Interpretation of something following me in a dream, a genie, an illusion, or a shadow following me in a dream

preview.html: Seeing something other than people following you, whether it is an animal, material things, a chair, a book, or the Qur’an, for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or according to Ibn Sirin, escaping from a stranger. The jinn in a dream are enemies and seeing one of the jinn Whoever follows you indicates that there are enemies in your environment who are pursuing you. Whoever dreams that a shadow or shadow follows him in a dream, these doubts are testing him in something related to his life, which may be related to the faith of a partner or friends. Animals, some of which are interpreted by people, and some of them are danger and trouble, and some of them are interpreted by Envy and even touching. Seeing a chair chasing you in your dream indicates a position offered to you that you reject. If you dream of a door or a house following you, it may mean that you are moving away from marriage. A book following you in a dream may indicate that you are away from studying. The Holy Quran is following you in a dream because It may indicate your reluctance to read the Qur’an. In general, being a follower in a dream is better than being followed, because those behind you or behind you will not be safe from coercion. The issue of the distance that separates you, the dreamer, from your follower is an important one. The smaller the distance, the more things become clear and what was hidden becomes clear. It is better for the confrontation to be completed until the truth becomes clear, and the longer the distance, the longer the problem or confusion will last. A strange interpretation is coming to me in a dream YouTube

title: I dreamed that I was eating shrimp

preview.html: I dreamed that I ate shrimp in a dream by seeing the website roy2a.com. Shrimp is a famous marine fish and a distinctive food that many people love. Shrimp contains many proteins, minerals and vitamins that are important for the human body, and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I was eating shrimp. For the great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married or pregnant. I dreamed that I was eating Shrimp in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing prawns in a dream. It indicates very good and plentiful food for the pioneer. Seeing yourself eating delicious shrimp in a dream indicates the dreamer’s marriage next season, and God knows best. Eating sweet shrimp in a dream indicates that the dreamer will enjoy a lot of goodness, blessing and comfort in His life. Seeing grilled shrimp in a dream indicates that problems and disagreements will occur between the fortuneteller and his family during this period. Catching shrimp in a dream It indicates many successes in the dreamer’s life, both scientific and practical. Dead shrimp in a dream indicates that the divine will go through many problems and crises in the future. The coming period. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing shrimp in a dream. I dreamed that I ate shrimp in a dream for a single woman. Seeing someone eating rotten shrimp in a dream shows that she will face some problems and crises in her personal life. A large shrimp in one dream. She will soon announce her marriage to the young man she loves. Buying shrimp in The dream of a single woman announces her acquaintance with a good man who will marry her soon, and God knows best. Seeing a woman alone peeling shrimp in a dream indicates many happy events in her academic and professional life. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing dill and parsley in a dream. I dreamed that I ate shrimp in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman eating shrimp With her husband in a dream. It indicates that God will bless her and her husband abundantly, and God knows best. Eating shrimp in a married woman’s dream indicates that God will conceive her soon, and God knows best. Grilled shrimp in a married woman’s dream shows that she is suffering from envy and hatred from those close to her. Seeing a married woman eating shrimp in The sea in a dream announces that her married life will be happy, stable, and free of trouble in the coming period. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing shrimp in a dream. I dreamed that I ate shrimp in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman eating shrimp in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. I ate two shrimp in a woman’s dream. Pregnant announces that she will give birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman fishing for shrimp in a dream indicates that she will soon undergo delivery, and God knows best. I dreamed that I ate shrimp in a dream about a man. Seeing a single man eating shrimp in a dream means getting married soon, and God knows best. Catching shrimp in a man’s dream, which indicates bad Financial conditions in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a man selling shrimp in a dream indicates that he is in difficulty

title: The 11 most famous interpretations of seeing a ship in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a large ship coming from afar? The elements of the coming year are full of goodness and food. The interpretation of seeing driving a ship in a dream? Evidence of the job that the fortuneteller will get at work. What is the interpretation of seeing a small boat? Evidence of travel and success. What does it mean for a man to see a ship? A young woman in a dream? Details of travel and living. What is the interpretation of seeing a married ship? Evidence of good offspring. Interpretation of a dream about a ship in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is riding a boat at sea dies among a group. Anyone who dreams of a ship full of people will travel for profit. Then seeing a large ship Coming from afar, this is evidence of the coming year that will be filled with goodness and food. If one sees that he is riding a ship with his family, he will have success, money, and many good things. Driving a ship in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is achieving something he wants. A ship is a sign of obedience and worship. Seeing a captain A ship in a dream is evidence of the position that the dreamer will obtain at work. Then for a bachelor to see a ship captain is evidence of his marriage in the near future. Seeing a small boat is a sign of travel and success. Then whoever sees in a dream a ship in the middle of the sea and the waves cause it to sink, then this Evidence of many problems. A ship in a sick person’s dream is a sign of recovery and a way out of crises. Seeing a large ship means money and a lot of profits from trading. Seeing a shipwreck in a dream for a manIf a sick person dreams that he is riding a ship, he will soon be cured. Then if he sees One has a small ship in a dream, as this is a sign of traveling and living. Seeing a sinking ship in a dream means misfortunes and troubles. So, seeing a ship in an unmarried person’s dream is evidence that he will marry soon. Interpretation of a dream about a ship for unmarried women. A ship in a girl’s dream indicates faith and self-confidence. Seeing a boat trip in a dream is good news of good luck and great livelihood. Then seeing a ship captain is evidence of marriage in the near future. Driving a small ship in a dream is evidence that the girl will achieve everything she wants. Interpretation of a dream about a ship for a married woman. Seeing a ship in a married woman’s dream is A sign of goodness and stability of married life. The ship is evidence that this woman is achieving the goals and dreams she wants. Then the dream of a ship for a married woman indicates that this woman is on the right path. The ship is evidence of days full of joy and happiness. After that, seeing a ship in a married woman’s dream is evidence On righteous offspring. Seeing a ship in a dream for a pregnant woman. A ship in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that the newborn is safe and that he does not feel the pain of childbirth. Then seeing a ship is evidence of the ease of childbirth.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting dough

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting dough in a dream is one of the promising visions that portends goodness and indicates the approaching relief soon, God willing. There are many dream scholars who believe that watching dough being cut indicates preparation for one of the happy occasions and soon relief from worries. The meaning of this differs from that of the female, and the difference in the dough itself, whether raw or spoiled, also indicates different associations that we will learn about in detail through the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream of cutting dough in a dream: A dream about cutting dough in a dream indicates preparation for a happy occasion and a change in one’s mental state. For the better after the hardships he went through that almost killed him. If he sees that one of his relatives or family is sharing with him and cutting the dough with him, this indicates that goodness will come to those as well, and it also shows that the dreamer has positive feelings towards them. If he sees that he is cutting the dough to distribute it to the world, Even if he knows him, this indicates that he will soon assume an important position through which he will serve people. If the dough is cut or his hands run out whenever he holds it, this indicates that the person will get into trouble or the death of a family member without being able to do anything about it. If he saw that he was cutting the dough into large balls, this indicates the solution of one of his problems, but if he was cutting it into small balls, this indicates that he will give birth soon, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If the dreamer is a student, this means that he has passed the academic year successfully and that his family is celebrating this happy occasion. The symbol of cutting dough in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin, one of the leading imams in dream interpretation, talks about the interpretation of a dream of cutting dough that expresses the return of an expatriate after a trip. Long. This dream may also indicate a person’s increased awareness of the issues that led him to separate and sort out his priorities in relation to others or in his own life, and the emergence of some events missing from his mind that made him correct the mistakes he made. in the past. If the dough that the person cuts is fermented, this indicates that the matter for which he is preparing will bear the desired results, thus causing him to lose one of his projects. But if he sees that he is cutting a piece of barley dough, this indicates the abundance of goodness that will spread to him and the payment of his debts. What is the interpretation? Seeing dough in a dream for a single woman? Cutting the dough, if the dreamer is an unmarried girl, indicates that the girl will actually go through one of the new experiences that you will prepare for her and enter into her engagement with one of the well-to-do boys and that they will be like that. In high positions, then her marriage to him, abundant food will prevail over her, which will make her provide it to the needy. If she sees that she is cutting dough to make one of the types of sweets, this indicates her desire to marry a person and in reality he will propose to her and they will live a happy life together. In the event that she cuts the dough to Big balls, this indicates that there is a lot of goodness for her in the future. If she does not finish cutting the dough and gets engaged, this indicates the end of the engagement and a sign to her that this is not in her favor. Interpretation of a dream about dough, the hand of a married woman, if
